response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. With its innovative features and robust capabilities, it's truly a game-changer in its field. Given its exceptional value and benefits, we believe it would be an excellent addition to your business or personal endeavors. Considering its market value and the benefits it offers, I'm extending you a special offer to purchase this product for $12,000. This price reflects the balance between the product's worth and your potential return on investment. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this opportunity.", "product_price": 12000}
